constants.description: Id of director of CE. At time of writing, it's Meli Marquez (4/24/2025)
constants.name: directorId

decisions.name: Do_we_already_have_a_case
decisions.label: Do we already have a case

decisions.description: If user's team is client support, escalation owner should be their user's manager. Otherwise, default to Meli
decisions.name: Team_Check
decisions.label: Team Check

Flow.description:
Updated routing.
- If created by someone outside of CE, owner and manager are Meli - If created by anyone in CE besides Meli, owner is their team lead and manager is Meli
Flow.label: Escalation | Button | Escalate Account

value.stringValue: If this is related to an existing case, please select from the list below.

fields.name: ConnectedPartnerInvolvement
fields.helpText: Is connected partner aware of, and/or involved in this escalation? (i.e. Principal)

fields.name: Fraud_Suspected
fields.helpText: If fraud is suspected, check this box.

fields.name: Do_you_have_any_reason_to_believe_PII_was_compromised
fields.fieldText: Do you have any reason to believe PII was compromised?

textTemplates.name: escOwnerChatterMessage
textTemplates.text: @[{!newEscalation.OwnerId}] ALERT - {!newEscalation.Escalated_Account__r.Name} has escalated! Please view escalation record for notes and next steps.
